plot: When the Shinogara finest warrior murders their leader, who`s also his father, his ninja enemies land a fatal blow. With only minutes left, Hayate transfers his soul into his sister`s body...but how long can two souls occupy the same body
vintage: 1991-05-21 to 1991-11-21 (as part of Anime V Comic Rentaman)
ending_theme: "Gensō Chitai" (幻想地帯) by Shinichi Ishihara (eps 1-3)
"Silent Night - Shiroi Yuki no Naka de" (Silent Night -白い雪の中で-) by Akino Arai (ep 4)
